Name: Epicure
About the game: ep·i·cure /ˈepəˌkyo͝or/ a person who takes particular pleasure in fine food and drink. What is the game, Epicure? In this indie game developed by a high schooler, you can cook amazing burgers and prepare drinks for your customers! Prepare your meals with 5 main ingredients: buns, cheese, meat, lettuce, and tomatoes. Each day lasts 2 minutes, and different events occur on different days as well. Epicure allows players to do a lot more as they progress each day. Collecting enough money to spend it at the shop is every player's main goal, and there are many products to buy from in the store. Try out this game for yourself, and embark on this EPIC(ure) culinary journey! Epicure has many gameplay features, and they include: IN THE KITCHEN Cooking patties Preparing drinks Assembling burgers Managing your time Serving food critics and important customers IN THE SHOP Buy new ingredients to work with Upgrade previously unlocked ingredients Remodel the kitchen with new colors IN THE GRID (MULTIPLAYER) Work with a teammate Complete a grid of orders together The first team to complete the grid wins (Red vs. Blue) NOTE FROM DEVELOPER: This game is still in early access, meaning that there will be significantly fewer features compared to the final version. Being a solo developer, it will be a bit hard to keep updating the game, but I will be sure to do it as much as I can.
